original_title: I Found My Heart in Santa Fe
overview: Follows the story of Viktor, a German NGO worker whose visit to Santa Fe, Cebu becomes more than just a travel experience when he meets the beautiful local, Jennifer. However, the islander is still reeling from her previous relationship, and sheâ€™s quite unable to acknowledge her instant connection to Viktor. Are things going to end well between them?
title: I Found My Heart in Santa Fe
